item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: I listen to both im a bit divided here... even tho i hav been a mcr fan longer, atm marilyn manson is my favourite artist out of both. personally i think marilyn over-reacted tho! he should have instead, talked to the band themselves NICELY and pointed out the similarities - of which he would hav noticed aren't that many
item.content:encoded: I listen to both im a bit divided here… even tho i hav been a mcr fan longer, atm marilyn manson is my favourite artist out of both. personally i think marilyn over-reacted tho! he should have instead, talked to the band themselves NICELY and pointed out the similarities – of which he would hav noticed aren’t that many

item.title: By: Donna

item.description:
